description.ko: 녹은 은의 격렬하고 아름다운 떨림을 통해 형상화된 소리의 보이지 않는 힘.
description.en: The invisible power of sound made manifest through the violent and beautiful tremors of molten silver.

prompt: A sphere of liquid mercury suspended in mid-air, reacting violently to an invisible low-frequency soundwave, erupting into sharp architectural spikes and vibrating ripples. Minimal lines and visualized soundwaves intersect the form. 4169E1 and FFD700 color accents. Unreal Engine 5, 8k, raytracing. High-speed motion blur on the edges of the liquid metal, sharp focus on the central resonance. Cinematic lighting with dramatic shadows emphasizing the physical form of sound.
